Can I upgrade from Free to Premium later: Can I upgrade from Free to Premium later?
Absolutely. You can upgrade at any time: Absolutely. You can upgrade at any time from your dashboard. All your existing memorial content will be preserved and you will instantly unlock all premium features.
All memorials are preserved indefinitely: All memorials are preserved indefinitely. Whether you are on a free or paid plan, we are committed to keeping your loved one's memorial accessible forever.
What is the QR code for gravestones?: What is the QR code for gravestones?
Premium members can generate a unique QR: Premium members can generate a unique QR code that links to the memorial page. Print it, engrave it on a plaque, or attach it to a headstone so visitors can scan it with their phone.
All payments are processed securely thro: All payments are processed securely through Stripe. We never store your credit card information on our servers.
Learn about GraveSpace and our mission t: Learn about GraveSpace and our mission to preserve the memory of loved ones through beautiful, lasting digital memorials.
GraveSpace was created with a simple, de: GraveSpace was created with a simple, deeply human belief: every life deserves to be remembered. We build tools that help families preserve and share the stories of those they love.
In a world that moves quickly, the memor: In a world that moves quickly, the memories of those we have lost can fade all too fast. Old photographs are tucked away in boxes. Stories live only in the minds of those who knew them. And with each passing year, the details grow softer.
GraveSpace exists to change that. We pro: GraveSpace exists to change that. We provide a dignified, beautiful space where families can gather their memories in one place: photographs, life stories, timelines, and heartfelt tributes from loved ones near and far.
\"Those we love don't go away, they walk: "Those we love don't go away, they walk beside us every day. Unseen, unheard, but always near; still loved, still missed, and very dear."\n-- Anonymous
Every memorial is treated with the rever: Every memorial is treated with the reverence it deserves. Our design choices reflect the gravity and beauty of honoring a life well lived.
Your memories are sacred. We offer robus: Your memories are sacred. We offer robust privacy controls and never monetize your data. You decide who sees what, always.
Memorials are not temporary. We are comm: Memorials are not temporary. We are committed to preserving your tributes indefinitely so future generations can connect with their heritage.
GraveSpace is built by a small, dedicate: GraveSpace is built by a small, dedicated team that understands the weight of loss and the importance of remembrance. We have personally experienced the comfort that comes from having a place to revisit cherished memories.
Every feature we build, every design dec: Every feature we build, every design decision we make, is guided by empathy and a deep respect for the families who trust us with their most precious memories.
